doc.title: Hollywood on the Rocks
doc.plot: A celebrity interview show where each week the minds minds of legendary filmmakers and new on-screen stars are probed about short films, the creative process, and exploring one central theme: falling in love or breaking off, raising kids or raising pets, traveling or cooking. Each episode will also include several shorts from Mini Movie channel's library of thousands of high-production-value short films unified around the same central theme from Chris' "indie-credible" vantage point.
